title: Gimme a C, a bouncy C…
content:
Not much to go on, but hoping someone will recognize this font. Thanks in advance for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015170859im_/http:/typophile.com/files/C_3486.jpg)
author: bethiepoo

comments.content: hm. considering the rest of the "inderella" looks like Benguiat with some minor modifications and mostly because it's Disney my guess is that the C is a total custom job.
